recipesJson.name: Ry4 Special
recipesJson.author: Bnutz
recipesJson.description: This recipe was completely inspired by kriswk's dillinger's dairy. I dropped the pistachio and the holy vanilla and added the most amazing flavor Flv Vanilla Bean. This is amazing. It has become my all day work vape, which means 8 to 10 hours a day vaping only one setup. I thank Kriswk and Flavorah because very little effort on my behalf went into this amazing recipe.
